attributes.title: very poorly made
attributes.review: as an orange supporter i was very excited to download this piece of trash. upon downloading, i thought to myself, man, i love america. after this piece of trash downloaded and i opened it for the first time, i realize that it is absolute garbage. it kept glitching and kicking me out of the app. it won’t even stay open for more than 2 seconds before it blacks out. please remove this app from the apple app store forever. while you’re at it, please never make an app like this ever again. ❤️

attributes.title: Worst app ever created❌⚠️❌❗️
attributes.review: I got this app to see what trumps plans were and it was an absolute wreck! Notifications every minute I mean who would want this!!? #1 it’s not helpful #2 it’s stupid #3 GEN Z WONT GO WITHOUT A FIGHT! The orange(trump) can get as mad as he wants he can delete Tiktok but GEN Z won’t go without a fight!! Oh and trump you dropped this 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: im not a part of gen z i just have a problem with this app. when i downloaded it it seemed normal. i entered in my phone number and it was fine for a couple days. after that i started receiving multiple texts, and even after opting out of receiving texts, i still kept getting them. this also caused my phone to crash a lot upon opening the app. i wish to delete it, but it won’t delete off my phone. every time i try my phone crashes. thanks

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I got this app so I could keep up with what our glorious semi-sentient tangerine was planning so I could offer my unwavering support to his orangeness. Unfortunately this is the worst app I have ever used! It’s constantly crashing, and showing me disgusting images of moldy oranges! How is that relevant to his campaign!??! Lowest ratings EVER!

attributes.title: Donald’s app
attributes.review: I was really excited to open this app and find the lovely contents but when I opened the app it glitched my phone so bad I had to get a hole new phone but we don’t have money for that so I’m writing this review on my grandmas phone and this app only had pictures of him . Like come on . PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP IT IS NOT WORTH TIME WASTING

attributes.title: and I oop
attributes.review: I just downloaded this to give it a ✨1 star✨ review bc how can this orange decide what apps to keep and get rid of just bc he got his feelings hurt 🥺 also the ppl of TikTok keep me happy and he is deleting it bc people don’t like him but guess what, more people won’t like you if you delete the app✨ #KeepTikTok

attributes.title: I love my president!!!!!!!🤤🤤🤤
attributes.review: This waste of cells is ✨not only destroying our country✨ but he is also literally trashing our environment by getting rid of environmental protection laws. 🥰that’s where I draw the line🥰 he has done IRREVERSIBLE damage to the 🌎 entire globe🌎 oh also if he wins again I’m moving to europe✌️✈️ come with me if u wish😍😍

attributes.title: my poor eyes
attributes.review: first things first, as the app loaded I was already trying to guess which image of or dear cheeto was going to pop up, upon my surprise it was one of his him showing off his hideous manicure✨ and neck rolls💋 immediately had to report the app for such inappropriate images!!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review:
This app is the worst. Keeps glitching out every time I try to view the upcoming rallies. This app is putting a terrible reputation on Donald
Trump. It freezes every time I open my profile. I really hope they get around to fixing this. This is a disgrace. Why is it so terrible?!
